greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum(n>=1, (-1)^(n + 1)*6/(n*(n + 1)*(n + 2)).
comment: The sum of terms of the inverse of Binomial(n,3) for n>=3, (or A000292(n), for n>=1) with alternating signs.
results.author: _Richard R. Forberg_, Aug 11 2014
ext: Prior Mathematica program replaced by _Harvey P. Dale_, Jun 02 2016
